page.title: 16The Hardware Shop
page.content: The hardware shop is owned by Mr. Brian Mc.Lean.He chose this kind of shop through his previous experience of working in home improvements.The shop does not cover all the needs of the people but he is learning what brands people buy and is trying to improve his outlets all the time. Pricewise he is beating the town shops with garden items like plants and composts.THe hardware side of the business is very competitive but the paint he sells is an un-advertised brand. It is mainly older people who come in because they prefer the freindly service,like items being carried out to cars.However he does have customers from an area including Northhampton, daventry and other places within a twenty five mile radius.
